metadata.title: CVE-2018-21247 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. There is an information leak (of uninitialized memory contents) in the libvncclient/rfbproto.c ConnectToRFBRepeater function.

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
veyon package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
x11vnc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
